job.title: Market Research Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>This position is responsible for helping develop strategic marketing plans for key market sectors across all AVX products, i.e. Automotive, Medical, Military/Aerospace, Industrial, etc. Plans will include AVX value proposition for each market and specific targeting strategies. This person will also work to help incorporate acquired companies into the AVX marketing strategy.<br><br><strong><u>Reports To<br><br></u></strong>Market Research Manager<br><br><strong><u>Duties And Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Help formulate marketing strategies for delivery to business unit for each product line.</li><li>Aid in establishing key marketing metrics.</li><li>Provide assistance in competitor profiles that include: Products, pricing, trends, and SWOT Analysis.</li><li>Coordinate with AVX Marketing Communications group for NPR releases, trade shows, and conferences/symposiums.</li><li>Analyze global RFQs for market trends.</li><li>Research market trends to identify new opportunities with existing products, potential new products, and acquisition targets.</li><li>Develop marketing communication strategies with AVX Marcom group, including technical articles, press releases, NPI, advertising, catalogs and datasheets, content for AVX website and landing page, and webinars.</li><li>Help facilitate communication on market trends/conditions and market research to various stakeholders including sales, FAE’s, APTC, operations, and executive management.<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Job Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>BS degree in Engineering</li><li>1+ years of experience, preferably in electronic components.</li><li>Ability to communicate at all levels. Should have experience with passive electronic components.</li><li>Ability to apply knowledge of competitor’s product lines and their relative position in the market.</li></ul>
